src_original: 'tshhams med 'gyur ba med/_/nad kyis nyen pa'i dgra bcom pa/_/mthong nas rang gi 'grin pa la/_/nad g.yog pa'i dge slong gis/_/btshir bas shi
der nyes pa med/_/gzhan du 'du shes pas gzhan du/_/shi bar gyur kyang
nyes pa med/_/ngan sems med na skyon med de/_/'dul ba las ni gsal
bar gsungs/_/gang phyir bcos pa'i bsam pa yis/_/mchod rten bshig
de'i nyes pa med/_/mtshhams med pa dang nyes byas pa/_/bsod nams phung po
'ba' zhig yin/_/bsam pa bzang pos thub pa'i dbur/_/gang gis lham gnyis bzhag pa dang /_/gzhan gyis de bzhin bsal ba la/_/gnyi gas rgyal
